name: SacredTurntable
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sacred turntable
des: Are you searching for traditional, God-honoring conservative music to bring peace and joy to your busy day? Sacred Turntable exists to be your source of Bible-based programming by preserving the treasury of sacred music from vinyl records, tape, and CDs. And it’s available 24 hours a day, worldwide, on any streaming service or device.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
